title: ability to retrieve the number of occurrences for a phrase
description:
The ability to retrieve the number of occurrences not only for a term but also 
for a Phrase.

http://www.mail-archive.com/lucene-dev@jakarta.apache.org/msg00101.html

comments.content: SpanNearQuery should handle this.  One could set up an exact match for the phrase and then iterate over the Spans and count.
comments.author: Grant Ingersoll
